references.reason: This paper introduces hindsight experience replay, a crucial technique used in the pre-training phase of MGPO to generate diverse long-horizon behaviors.

references.paper_title: Finite-time analysis of the multiarmed bandit problem
references.reason: This paper provides the theoretical foundation for the multi-armed bandit framework used in MGPO's online prompt optimization strategy.

references.paper_title: Decision Transformer: Reinforcement learning via sequence modeling
references.reason: This paper introduces Decision Transformers, the core architecture employed in MGPO to model sequences of goals and predict actions.
This paper highlights the power of pre-trained language models to adapt efficiently to downstream tasks via prompt optimization, a concept that inspired MGPO's design.
This paper introduces the Proximal Policy Optimization algorithm, a reinforcement learning algorithm used in one of MGPO's baselines for fine-tuning the pre-trained policy.
